channel.title: What is it you want in a 711+ private server?
channel.description:
Im creating a server, but I want to know what it is the people want to play before I finish something.
So, when you log in what draws you to a RSPS?
What is it that makes you leave?
My Thoughts..
I like a server that is easy to get into, meaning bossing wont take weeks of work, but it wont happen the first day..
I hate a server that all you see is 'Donator This' and 'Donator that', I understand donations are needed to have a successful server, but there needs to be a boundary.
Share your thoughts!

item.title: What is it you want in a 711+ private server?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:7, topic:459840”][quote author=JavaTC link=topic=562742.msg4103089#msg4103089 date=1347724394]
For them to not exist. They’re all buggy as fuck, laggy (both connection wise and because of the graphics),and ran by people who don’t even know what they’re doing in the slightest.
[/quote]

/thread[/quote]

continue;
JavaTC:

For them to not exist. They’re all buggy as fuck, laggy (both connection wise and because of the graphics),and ran by people who don’t even know what they’re doing in the slightest.

/thread

Read full topic
